list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment:
SAC Cozmo improved (but needs testing)
- Enabled autotune - Warm-Up episodes set to 10 - Batch Size

configuration.name: sphinx task in sphinx task in

item.itemvalue: Python docs.sphinx task in sphinx task in

task.summary: Default task
First Huge Commit of Cozmo-SAC

Update CozmoDriver-v0 env
- Graphical Improvement - Change of reward function

Main of Cozmo-SAC improvement
- Added a Test phase with key Q
Reward function reverted to the original formula (1 correct, 0 end of episode) in order to test it

getImage fixed
- B/N Image with one channel - Image Size as parameter of the env
Forget Phase Backend added to CozmoDriver

Complete refactor of SAC_COZMO
- The main is reduced to the declaration of env and agent with the start of training phase - Forget phase implemented - ImageWrapper no more used. TO BE DELETED
First Skeleton of Master Thesis LateX
First Skeleton of Master Thesis Presentation
Registration of CozmoDriver simplified for the user
Documentation of StateBuffer added

Improved Environment
- Reward proportional to mm - Improved Forget Phase - Improved Initial Make phase

TeX update
- Master Thesis updated - Report SAC update
Refactoring and experiments with code. Still no good results... :(

Brand new functionality to make learning phase easy.
[All features are not tested yet] - **Restore functionality**: Now the learning process can be stopped and saved in the main folder of the experiment. This allows the user to restore the experiment with the same net, the same replay buffer, etc. This can be useful for training which lasts longer than expected. You can close and save the context with the internet interface of OpenAI Cozmo environment using key C.
- **Tensorboard in the main**: Before this implementation, Tensorboard had to be started separately from the main script. Now it is launched with the application and you can have the dashboard with a small link in the Cozmo RL Dashboard
Little enhancement of the TeX of my thesis
Refactoring and comments

Enhancement of SAC
- Added a sleep of 0.05s in order to calibrate learning and random phase during experiment. - Added a learning phase after the experiment in order to reach 100 updates for episode. - Other fixes and refactoring
Gym_Cozmo enhacement
Very little step in Master Thesis
Improvement in the main code of SAC Cozmo - Implementation of choice_time - Trying to implement a decreasing learning rate with a scheduler
First attempt to create documentation with Sphinx for SAC Cozmo

Added Environment CozmoMock
- This is a fake environment that must be used only for debugging purpose
A fix in the cover of the thesis

Refactoring and fixing bugs
- Fixed NaN output of the net. I am trying to decrease softly the learning rate during learning and I just found out that 0.99 as start value is not a good idea!
Fix CozmoMock
Restored HP and LR as before all modifications

Cozmo Environment modified
- Starting position (in degree) of the head changed to 0. - The state image is now the lower section of the entire image obtained by Cozmo. The original input is 240x320, now it is cutted in an half and the lower part is used (140x320). - The image is not resized anymore and the proportion are mantained (no square anymore) - Modified the initialization (make phase) of the environment - Small changes in `test.py`: now it uses `CozmoMock-v0` in order to make it more "debuggable"

Cozmo SAC improvements:
- Deleted the scheduler for Learning Rate. It causes a lot of trouble: we can think to re-implement it in the future. - Problem in the test phase fixed: one function was bad-indented. - Changes of state image dimension were propagated to the main code. - Other minor fixes and changes

Cozmo Environment modified
- Restored starting position (in degree) of the head to the lowest angle. - State image restored to the original input 240x320

Sac Cozmo Algorithm modified
- Restored state to the original input is 240x320 in the main and in CNNs

SAC Cozmo improved (but needs testing)
- Warm-Up episodes set to 10 - Updates_per_episode = 1000 - Added a counter to see the length of memory added from the last learning phase (testing in progress)

Creating `latest_ideas.md` file
This file will contain all the main ideas elaborated during the experiments.

MESSAGE.value: First Skeleton of Master Thesis Presentation
Registration of CozmoDriver simplified for the user
Documentation of StateBuffer added

Improved Environment
- Reward proportional to mm - Improved Forget Phase - Improved Initial Make phase

TeX update
- Master Thesis updated - Report SAC update
Refactoring and experiments with code. Still no good results... :(

Brand new functionality to make learning phase easy.
[All features are not tested yet] - **Restore functionality**: Now the learning process can be stopped and saved in the main folder of the experiment. This allows the user to restore the experiment with the same net, the same replay buffer, etc. This can be useful for training which lasts longer than expected. You can close and save the context with the internet interface of OpenAI Cozmo environment using key C.
- **Tensorboard in the main**: Before this implementation, Tensorboard had to be started separately from the main script. Now it is launched with the application and you can have the dashboard with a small link in the Cozmo RL Dashboard
Little enhancement of the TeX of my thesis
Refactoring and comments

Enhancement of SAC
- Added a sleep of 0.05s in order to calibrate learning and random phase during experiment. - Added a learning phase after the experiment in order to reach 100 updates for episode. - Other fixes and refactoring
Gym_Cozmo enhacement

Improvement in the main code of SAC Cozmo - Implementation of choice_time - Trying to implement a decreasing learning rate with a scheduler
First attempt to create documentation with Sphinx for SAC Cozmo

Added Environment CozmoMock
- This is a fake environment that must be used only for debugging purpose
A fix in the cover of the thesis

Refactoring and fixing bugs
- Fixed NaN output of the net. I am trying to decrease softly the learning rate during learning and I just found out that 0.99 as start value is not a good idea!
Fix CozmoMock
Restored HP and LR as before all modifications

Cozmo Environment modified
- Starting position (in degree) of the head changed to 0. - The state image is now the lower section of the entire image obtained by Cozmo. The original input is 240x320, now it is cutted in an half and the lower part is used (140x320). - The image is not resized anymore and the proportion are mantained (no square anymore) - Modified the initialization (make phase) of the environment - Small changes in `test.py`: now it uses `CozmoMock-v0` in order to make it more "debuggable"

Cozmo SAC improvements:
- Deleted the scheduler for Learning Rate. It causes a lot of trouble: we can think to re-implement it in the future. - Problem in the test phase fixed: one function was bad-indented. - Changes of state image dimension were propagated to the main code. - Other minor fixes and changes

Cozmo Environment modified
- Restored starting position (in degree) of the head to the lowest angle. - State image restored to the original input 240x320

Sac Cozmo Algorithm modified
- Restored state to the original input is 240x320 in the main and in CNNs

SAC Cozmo improved (but needs testing)
- Warm-Up episodes set to 10 - Updates_per_episode = 1000 - Added a counter to see the length of memory added from the last learning phase (testing in progress)
